text: David Wayne Loebsack (; born December 23, 1952) is an American politician. He was the U.S. Representative for from 2007 to 2021. He is a member of the Democratic Party. He was aprofessor of political science at Cornell College. On April 12, 2019, Loebsack announced he would not seek reelection. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Iowa Category:American political scientists Category:Academics from Iowa Category:Politicians from Sioux City, Iowa Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Dave Loebsack
